goals.active: Meet Zojja and reconsider the situation.
goals.complete: A fresh look at Councillor Haia's VAL-A golem blueprints seems to indicate an overlooked, intentional exploit in her modifications. It's time to confront the councilor!

Councillor Haia got off scot-free, but I rescued the other members of the Arcane Council from her treachery. I realize they make a practice of one-upmanship, but this was ridiculous! Well, at least my name is cleared.
